headline: NRG stock is up 60% in 2025. CEO talks smart homes and energy deals.
summary: NRG Energy (NRG) — an electrical power and natural gas provider — has seen its stock skyrocket by over 60% in 2025 year-to-date and over 80% in the last year. NRG CEO Larry Coben sits down with Julie Hyman to uncover the so-called "why behind the high," elaborating on NRG's portfolio of energy solutions, integrations into smart homes, the company's deal with LS Power, and the rising prominence of AI data center deals between Big Tech and energy developers. Also catch Julie Hyman's full interview with Trane Technologies (TT) Chairman and CEO Dave Regnery. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: Will NRG's Acquisition and Capital Expenditure Set New Growth Path?
summary: NRG Energy's $12 billion LS Power buy doubles its generation capacity and sets the stage for long-term growth and clean energy expansion.

headline: NRG Energy Used This Accounting Trick to Make Its Earnings Look Less Volatile
summary: The company’s interpretation of accounting rules allows it to mask swings in its derivative contracts.
